data.title: Purple Star School Applications
data.text:
The Indiana Purple Star School Designation honors schools that have displayed a significant commitment to service members, veterans, and students and families connected to our nation’s military. The Purple Star School Designation is valid for a three-year time period. Schools awarded this designation are listed below.

For additional questions, contact IDOE’s Office of Communications and External Affairs.

Timeline:

Application Available - April 26, 2024

Application Due - September 2, 2024

Award Notification - November 8, 2024
